channel.title: Financial Reporting on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Reporting on FinanClub

item.title: CC
item.description: score:18 Chances: Chemours Co delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023. The company’s Advanced Performance Materials segment is producing polymers and advanced materials with various attributes that are in demand. The review conducted by the Audit Committee has addressed some of the internal control issues, providing an opportunity for improved financial reporting.
